comment.text: Working here native and in a VM.

long_desc.thetext: This release fixes several security bugs rated as of High consequence.
We're waiting for nss update here.

OK Martin, thanks.

Looks like the nss update is available on koji now.
The x86_64 version is installed here and working happily, not sure why i686 failed to build.

FEDORA-2022-38179cd087 has been pushed to the Fedora 36 stable repository.
If problem still persists, please make note of it in this bug report.

FEDORA-2022-1f8312716f has been pushed to the Fedora 35 testing repository.
Soon you'll be able to install the update with the following command:
`sudo dnf upgrade --enablerepo=updates-testing --refresh --advisory=FEDORA-2022-1f8312716f`
You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2022-1f8312716f

See also https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for more information on how to test updates.

Soon you'll be able to install the update with the following command:
`sudo dnf upgrade --enablerepo=updates-testing --refresh --advisory=FEDORA-2022-25e330a435`

See also https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for more information on how to test updates.

FEDORA-2022-25e330a435 has been pushed to the Fedora 37 stable repository.
If problem still persists, please make note of it in this bug report.
